Articles.Content:
Is there a mod out there that adds a 1.25m passenger cabin?

The idea is for a super light spaceplane to carry one or two kerbals, aside from the pilot, to and from low orbit.

Think AIES [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35383-0-21-1-AIES-Aerospace-v1-4-2](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/35383-0-21-1-AIES-Aerospace-v1-4-2) and Monkey Business [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111669-0-90-Monkey-Business-Inc](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/111669-0-90-Monkey-Business-Inc)

also maybe Tantares [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81537-0-90-Tantares-Stockalike-Soyuz-and-MIR-20-1-02-04-2015-KIS-Fix](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/81537-0-90-Tantares-Stockalike-Soyuz-and-MIR-20-1-02-04-2015-KIS-Fix) and looking for one that starts with a HGR [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60974-Home-Grown-Rocket-parts%28HGR%29-Update-Jan-14-better-visibility-and-mod-support](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60974-Home-Grown-Rocket-parts%28HGR%29-Update-Jan-14-better-visibility-and-mod-support).

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-06T05:45:00Z" title="04/06/2015 05:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 6, 2015</time> by Mecripp2**

Cool, monkey business seems to have what I'm looking for.

It's gonna look like hate on a stick with the B9 1.25m parts, but it'll do the job
There used to be a Firespitter one too, not sure if that's still available.

[Ven's Stock Revamp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-90-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-7-2!) and Sam Hall has one included along with his [Kerbonov cockpit](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/66502-Kerbonov-Kn-2-Cockpit-Module).
Also check out Nertea's [Stockalike Station Parts Expansion](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91814).
